This game is always one of my "go to" games. It is the best when you play with an entire team of survivors and is a blast, especially for the price point. The devs are CONSTANTLY updating with new cosmetic gear, survivors, and killers. I have honestly had more fun playing this game than any recent AAA game. Grab this title for something different, very fun, and will not disappoint!

Dead by Daylight is a hard game to recommend or recommend against because I consider it to be a constant "work in progress". New content gets added every 3 months, and in between that time the balancing is adjusted as the devs see fit. The upside to this is it's in a very healthy state with a huge playerbase and there are always tons of new killers/survivors to choose from. The downside is that with every new addition comes new bugs that won't get fixed until weeks after the new DLCs are released, because the devs' main focus is content and not patching up the game so that it's in a more stable state. 

The reason I give it a recommendation is because there's no other horror game that replicates the gameplay, and none have as much licensed content in them as DBD. Other games have tried to compete that are in the same asymmetrical genre, but none have been as popular nor have any stayed alive as long as DBD has. If you enjoy playing as a horror villain or being chased by one, DBD has every other game beat despite its balancing issues and bugs.

Dead By Buglight!-30.06.2019r.
=============
Gra jest nad wyraz dobra, czasami zdarzą się jakieś błędy ale nie są one zazwyczaj karygodne.
A prawda jest taka: Godziny, ranga czy poziom gracza nic nie znaczą najważniejsze jest doświadczenie oraz technika podejścia do tej gry. :)

Es un juegazo,con momentos de terror,de diversión y suspense.Lo negativo,es que algunas mecánicas deberían mejorar,como el matchmaking el tiempo de espera del asesino,la optimización en algunos mapas, equilibrar a todos los killers, (ya que hay algunos,que se usan muchos,y otros casi nunca),pero por lo menos están constantemente los desarrolladores trabajando en el juego para equilibrarlo todo con actualizaciones,con personajes nuevos y cambios de balance

ТРЕШ)

Nice game, but let's face it: even if it is very funny to play, it always happen that killer camps or tunnel a lot. Which ruin all the game, giving no possibility except abandon our teammate, or die with it. Not even talking about some perk 90% player killer use because it is cheated as f*ck ("Hex: Ruin" and else if you know what I mean).

It's still a pretty good game if you have the luck to find nice team mates and a nice killer. It happen sometimes and it give the sort of games everybody can enjoy, even into defeat. Graphics are... Enjoyable. At least it's good enought to play, since it isn't the sort of game where you gonna afk-watching.

I'm not even talking about this toxic community in low-lvl ranks where people basically go on your Steam Page just to insult you because they died like 'tard (which is always your fault, never them) or because you disconnected by accident when connecting to the game.

Even if I'm a bit rude, I really enjoy play this game, and I'm gonna play again and again during a long time I think. I don't get use to it and this is the most important for me. And even it some people are really toxic, I really enjoyed play with some others.
Amazing game, fun killers and thrillers! :)

You love this game because there is none other quite like it, it still gets support even three years after release, and there's satisfaction to be found both in outrunning the Killer as well as shanking helpless young adults (and Ash). You hate this game because hitboxes are wack, bug fixes (more often than not) take ages to happen, and the community is (more often than not) more toxic than Chernobyl.

tl;dr - You WILL have a love/hate relationship with this game. Get it anyway.

If this game is free to play, just give it a damn try (I mean why not?!?) perhaps you'll fall in love the way I did and manage to grab it in one of the many sales on this game.

Guten Tag,
Ich habe schon von Anfang an "Dead By Daylight" gespielt und muss sagen, es ist ein sehr gutes Spiel.
Mein einziges Problem damit ist, dass es einige Killer gibt, die ihren "besonderen Spielstil" haben, dass heißt sie Campen oder Tunneln (dass sind Killer, die es unmöglich machen für einige Surviver zu entkommen), Und natürlich ist das nicht verboten, aber es ist nervig und frustrierend (Spiele überwiegend Surviver, aber auch Killer und es ist auch ohne Campen möglich).

Schlussendlich ist das Spiel aber sehr gut und ich empfehle es definitiv weiter,

LG, NeminorL
